attributes.review: Didn’t get any response or updates from the campaign. I don’t know if it was just me, I’ve only had the app for awhile, but am very upset by this. This is just down right awful that someone who create an app that I can’t even fully enjoy. How am I suppose to know when Trump is throwing a fit. Am I suppose to go on Twitter. No! I shine able to go on this app and watch him complain about Democrats on here. I would also like a live on this app, so when The Supreme Court makes a decision I want to watch him throw a fit as he finds out about it. I would also like a video proving he is clinically sane, If possible. I want a list of people Trump Hates on here, so I can follow them. I just want to end my review with ACAB AND BLM.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: RIGHT when I opened the app, my phone started to vibrate😖  THEN my phone turned into an orange🍊the orange started to talking to me saying that if i didnt support trump, it would turned my whole family into oranges🍊💉🧬 i had to squash the orange for it to stop being an annoying orange!🦶when i did that a shrimp appeared🍤 i ran to different country but somehow the shrimp turned into a flying shrimp!🍤 then a plane hit the shrimp, and i finally was let in peace... SIKE! After the shrimp died it turned into a GIANT pig.🐖🐖 the width of the pig was more than the length of the Burj Khalifa tower!🏙 i ran to a someone that knew about this horriable app.📱 when i got their the guy gave me a potion🧪 he told to splash this on the creature and everything would be normal🩹 I ran towards the pig and splash the pig with the potion! BOOM!💥 the big turned into a microscopic pig🔬🐖 I put the pig in an ant cage🐜 I had to buy another phone to warn people this horriable app!😡⚠️
